post.body: Imagine it: a whole line of black market anti-eLogic apparel. A mesh trucker hat emblazoned with "Dude, Where's My Code?"
If I end up in the East River wearing cement shoes, you know who the culprit is. See that justice is served. And eLogic thwarted.
Got a $200 Kenneth Cole wrap dress for $19.98. Holy recession, Batman!
I think you secretly covet The Twitter Crackhead Crown.
I'm with you on Benny Button: sentimental, Forrest Gump-esque dreck. Dying to see Slumdog Millionaire.
If eLogic had a face, it'd be an ass.
Dammit, Santa didn't give LJ a new CMS.
The male model is at it with his gf again. I feel like I live in a bad rom-com. They have ten minutes before I lose my Virgo shit on them.
What's that saying? Good writing is 95 percent rewriting.
Trying to shake off my Midwestern hangover and write statement of purpose for lib school. Feel 25 again with the benefits of 33's wisdom.
Just found out my pal Joe played in Eartha Kitt's last band. The lady wanted no funeral and to be cremated. She taught James Dean to dance.
Reading A Phillps's latest. A good and bad example of how to write about Music and iPods. Intrigued and annoyed. http://tinyurl.com/88j2z9
Ha, the card reads:"Our New Year's Resolution is to keep it down and be better neighbors. Your awesome/cute neibs, Philippe & Chase."
Look like the wrath of god, but back in the bosom of my beloved Bklyn. Kittie snide but calm. Missing my gang. Got a card from male models.
Remembering w/bro how on trip to Dalkey island our rowboater keeled over and had seizure. We thought we were going to have to swim the bay
You know it's been a good Christmas when your parents only fought about your Dad calling Michael "Lord of the Dance" Flatley "a prick"
It's 6 degrees (feels like -4), but my dad and I are going to grill some choice North Dakota steaks. My sister might be getting drunk.
Ha! LJ got name-checked in that article: "You start your day by leafing through...book reviews in Library Journal."
Librarian ranks in US News & World Report's "Best Careers of 2009." Whoa. Guess what dropped out? Editor! http://tinyurl.com/567yft
Merry fuckin' Christmas! Ah, yes, that felt good.
